name: hbaev
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s2, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s2, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s2, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: Version of ~ hbae with a disjoint variable condition, requiring fewer axioms. Instance of ~ hbaevg and ~ aev2 . (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 22-Mar-2021.)
